member.name: T:Leadtools.Pdf.Annotations.AnnPDFConvertor
member.summary: Defines a class that converts between AnnObject annotation objects and PDFAnnotation annotation objects.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Pdf.Annotations.AnnPDFConvertor.ConvertFromPDF(Leadtools.Pdf.PDFAnnotation,Leadtools.Annotations.Engine.AnnContainer,Leadtools.LeadSizeD)
member.summary: Converts a list of PDFAnnotation objects into a list of AnnObject objects by adding it to target AnnContainer.
member.param: The list of PDFAnnotation objects to fill into AnnContainer. This value must not be **null**.
The target AnnContainer is used to fill into it a list of PDFAnnotation objects. This parameter must not be **null**.
The size of the PDF page with the annotations.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Pdf.Annotations.AnnPDFConvertor.ConvertToPDF(Leadtools.Annotations.Engine.AnnContainer,Leadtools.Pdf.PDFAnnotation,System.Double)
member.summary: Converts the annotation objects inside AnnContainer to a list of PDFAnnotation objects.
member.param: The source container that holds a list of annotation objects. This value must not be **null**.
The target list of PDFAnnotation to fill converted objects into. This value must not be **null**.
The height of the PDF page to add annotations into.
